title: Penn Orji
text:
Penn Ikechukwu Orji (born 4 April 1991) is a Nigerian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="Vasco%20S.C.">Vasco S.C.</a> in the <a href="Goa%20Professional%20League">Goa Professional League</a>
as a <a href="Midfielder">central midfielder</a>.
